About Cricket Records

The Cricket World Cup 2023 is a major international cricket tournament featuring teams from around the world competing for the title of world champions. Held every four years, it is one of the most prestigious events in cricket. The tournament showcases thrilling matches, intense rivalries, and extraordinary performances from players representing their nations. With a rich history and a global fan base, the World Cup is a platform where teams demonstrate their skills, strategies, and resilience, creating moments of excitement and glory that resonate throughout the cricketing world. This dataset will show Cricket batting and bowling records of Cricket WorldCup 2023.

Batting Records

Dataset link :

Batting Records

Description Of Batting Data

Variable Description
Player Name of the cricket player.
Span The time duration during which the player participated in matches.
Match Total number of matches played by the player.
Innings Number of innings played by the player.
Not Out Number of times the player remained not out in innings.
Runs Total runs scored by the player.
Highest The highest score achieved by the player in a single inning.
Average The average runs scored per dismissal.
Balls Faced Total number of balls faced by the player.
Strike Rate Rate at which runs are scored per 100 balls faced.
100 Total number of centuries (100 runs in a single inning) scored by the player.
50 Total number of half-centuries (50 runs in a single inning) scored by the player.
0 Total number of times the player got out without scoring.
4s Total number of fours (boundaries) hit by the player.
6s Total number of sixes (over boundaries) hit by the player.

Bowling Records

Dataset link :

Bowling Records

Description Of Bowling Data

Variable Description
Player Name of the cricket player.
Span The time duration during which the player participated in matches as a bowler.
Match Total number of matches bowled by the player.
Innings Number of innings bowled by the player.
Balls Total number of balls bowled by the player.
Overs Total number of overs bowled by the player.
Maiden Over Total number of maiden overs bowled by the player.
Runs Total runs conceded by the player.
Wickets Total wickets taken by the player.
BBI Best Bowling in an innings by the player.
Average The average runs conceded per wicket taken.
Economy The average number of runs conceded per over bowled.
Strike Rate The average number of balls bowled per wicket taken.
4 Wickets Total number of times the player took 4 wickets in an innings.
5 Wickets Total number of times the player took 5 wickets in an innings.
